title: Federated Learning Simulation
description: Developed a machine learning model using Federated Learning to predict energy output across  multiple power stations while ensuring data privacy and avoiding a single point of failure.

title: Traveling Salesman Problem Solver with A* Search
description: Developed a C++ program to solve the Traveling Salesperson Problem using the A* search algorithm. It incorporates a Minimum Spanning Tree (MST) heuristic to optimize the search process, demonstrating efficient pathfinding and cost minimization in graph traversal.

title: Custom UNIX shell Implementation
description: Built a custom UNIX shell in C that includes command parsing, process management, and I/O redirection, enhancing understanding of OS concepts like process lifecycles, IPC, and signal handling.
